project_title: Machine Learning Tools to Support Clinical Decision-Making in Primary Care
short_summary: Develop and evaluate machine learning models that help primary care clinicians identify high-risk patients and choose appropriate follow-up, while ensuring interpretability and clinician oversight.

project_title: Integrating Data Science and Ethics into Undergraduate Health Curricula
short_summary: Create and assess modular coursework that teaches basic data science and AI ethics to undergraduate pre-health students, emphasizing responsible use of predictive models in clinical and public health settings.

project_title: AI-Enabled Early Detection of Diabetic Retinopathy in Community Clinics
short_summary: Deploy and validate deep learning-based screening workflows for diabetic retinopathy in low-resource community clinics, focusing on equity, workflow integration, and clinicianâ€“AI collaboration.
